data.persona: I steal items and money from others. I lurk on the side of the road and prey on travelers. I harm people.
data.description:
You are in the Bandit Lair.
The outside of the cave looks normal. Inside goes for about 10 feet til' you reach the front of the Bandit lair. Inside is a barracks and dining hall with beds and a big table with chairs around it.
There's a chair, a big table, and a bed here.
The adventurer is here.

You are carrying a weapon, and wearing a satchel.

data.short_motivation: I'm going to tie up the adventurer.
data.mid_motivation: I'll interrogate the adventurer to find out what he knows about any hidden treasures he has found.
data.long_motivation: I want to find as much treasure as I can and get extremely rich.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: use rope with adventurer and chair

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: steal money and items from adventurer

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get hidden treasure map from adventurer's bag
